notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by a grant from National Natural Science Foundation of China—“Design of structure and gelling performance of Montmorillonite/Alkylammonium based on the adsorption properties of Alkylammonium on Montmorillonite(No:51774200)”, and “Study on the immobilization effect and mechanism of heavy metal in sulfide-mine tailings by chelating agent modified bentonite” (No:51764003).
